description: Subclass 500 Student Visa. Optimized for the 'Genuine Student' (GS) requirement.

meta.passport_validity: Must be valid for the duration of stay
meta.min_funds_requirement:
**Financial Thresholds:**

* **Student (Living):** AUD 29,710/year
* **Partner:** AUD 10,394/year
* **Child:** AUD 4,449/year
* **Travel:** ~AUD 2,000
* **Tuition:** 1st Year Fees paid or held in account.
* **Total Proof:** Approx ~AUD 50,000 - 60,000 (approx. ₹28-34 Lakhs) usually required to be 'Safe'.

documents.title: Valid Passport
documents.description: Color scan of bio pages. Must be valid for the entire course duration.

documents.title: Confirmation of Enrolment (CoE)
documents.description: Mandatory: You cannot apply without the CoE code issued after paying the deposit.

documents.title: Genuine Student (GS) Responses
documents.description: Mandatory 150-word responses inside ImmiAccount about ties to home, value of course, reasons for choosing university, and previous study history.

documents.title: Financial Evidence (Strict)
documents.description:
**Accepted:** Education Loan Sanction Letter, Savings (3+ months old), FDs.
**Rejected:** Property valuation, CA reports, gold loans, mutual funds (not liquidated).

documents.title: OSHC Policy
documents.description: Overseas Student Health Cover covering entire visa duration (Course + 2 months).

documents.title: National ID (Aadhaar)
documents.description: Optional secondary ID, often requested for Indian applicants.

documents.title: English Test Results
documents.description: IELTS / PTE / TOEFL iBT. Must be less than 2 years old.

steps_flow.title: Get CoE (Mandatory First Step)
steps_flow.description: Apply → Receive Offer → Pay Deposit + OSHC → Receive CoE. CoE code is mandatory for Visa 500.

steps_flow.title: Create ImmiAccount
steps_flow.description: This is the official account used for all Australian visa applications.

steps_flow.title: Start Visa 500 Application + GS Questions
steps_flow.description: Select 'Student Visa (Subclass 500)'. Complete GS questionnaire honestly (150+ words each).

steps_flow.title: Upload Documents & Pay Fee
steps_flow.description:
Upload PDF/JPEG files (< 5MB each).
Pay AUD 1,808 using Credit/Debit card or PayPal.

steps_flow.title: Biometrics & Medical Examination (HAP ID)
steps_flow.description:
After submitting, download your **HAP ID**.
- Book medicals via eMedical panel clinic.
- Book biometrics at VFS Australia.

top_universities: University of New South Wales (UNSW Sydney)

application_platforms.name: University Portals
application_platforms.description: Applications are submitted directly to each university's online portal.

required_exams: Bachelor’s:  12th with 60–70% Master’s:  Bachelor’s with 50–60% minimum  Higher unis want 65%+

pre_visa_steps.title: Get the Offer Letter
pre_visa_steps.description: Apply to the university and receive your conditional or full offer letter.

pre_visa_steps.title: Accept the Offer + Pay Initial Tuition Deposit
pre_visa_steps.description: Sign the acceptance form and pay the deposit to secure your seat.

pre_visa_steps.title: Receive Your CoE (Confirmation of Enrolment)
pre_visa_steps.description: The university will issue the CoE, which is mandatory for the visa application.

pre_visa_steps.title: Arrange Financial Proof
pre_visa_steps.description: Ensure you meet the Genuine Temporary Entrant (GTE) financial requirements.

pre_visa_steps.title: OSHC (Health Insurance)
pre_visa_steps.description: Purchase Overseas Student Health Cover for the duration of your course.

pre_visa_steps.title: Prepare Visa Documents
pre_visa_steps.description: Gather all required documents including passport, academic transcripts, and financial proofs.

pre_visa_steps.title: Create ImmiAccount + Apply for Visa
pre_visa_steps.description: Log in to ImmiAccount and submit your Student Visa (Subclass 500) application.

pre_visa_steps.title: Biometrics + Medical Examination
pre_visa_steps.description: Complete your biometrics and medical health check as instructed.
